sections.title: Whole-grain swaps help, but GI control comes from the whole plate
sections.summary: Whole grains outperform refined ones on post-meal glucose in RCTs, but effects vary.
sections.recommendation: Pair carbs with protein/fat to blunt glucose rise (e.g., rice cakes + cottage/FAGE + turkey).

sections.title: Quinoa has modest, positive cardio-metabolic effects
sections.summary: Trials and recent reviews report small reductions in LDL-C, weight and glucose when quinoa replaces other carbs.

sections.title: Rice cakes: high GI alone ‚Äî keep pairing them
sections.summary: Brown-rice/quinoa cakes can spike glucose if eaten alone.
sections.recommendation: Always add protein or fat (FAGE 0%, turkey slices, hummus, avocado).

sections.title: Tuna & mercury: enjoy, but rotate species
sections.summary: Spanish AESAN advises regular fish intake while managing mercury exposure.
sections.recommendation: Rotate tuna with salmon/pavo/chicken; keep variety weekly.
